data.Set Point: Set Point To deploy reference image
data.filter_none_desc: No filter applied. Use basic adjustments only.
data.filter_edge_desc: Detects edges in the image using Sobel operator.
data.filter_blur_desc: Applies box blur to smooth the image.
data.filter_sharpen_desc: Enhances edges and details in the image.
data.mode_edge_desc: Sobel edge detection - detects edges using gradient calculation.
data.mode_canny_desc: Canny edge detection - more advanced edge detection with Gaussian blur.
data.mode_color_seg_desc: Color segmentation - quantizes colors for analysis.
data.mode_histogram_desc: Histogram enhancement - improves contrast through histogram equalization.
data.edge_sensitivity_help: Adjust edge sensitivity. Lower values detect more edges.
data.color_threshold_help: Adjust color quantization level. Higher values create fewer color regions.
data.histogram_help: Enhances image contrast by redistributing pixel intensity values.
data.histogram_not_available: Histogram not available. Click Apply to generate.
data.color_grading_basic_desc: Basic color correction with temperature, tint, and exposure controls.
data.color_grading_advanced_desc: Advanced color grading with lift, gamma, gain, and color balance.
data.color_grading_split_desc: Split toning for creative color effects in shadows and highlights.
data.uv_controls_help: Adjust scale, offset, and rotation of the blend texture.
data.mask_help: Use a mask texture to control blend amount per pixel.
data.blend_normal_desc: Normal blend - replaces base with blend texture.
data.blend_overlay_desc: Overlay - combines multiply and screen based on base color.
data.blend_darken_desc: Darken - keeps darker colors from both layers.
data.blend_lighten_desc: Lighten - keeps lighter colors from both layers.
data.blend_difference_desc: Difference - subtracts colors for creative effects.
data.blend_exclusion_desc: Exclusion - similar to difference but softer.
data.effect_pixelate_desc: Pixelate - creates retro pixel art look.
data.effect_posterize_desc: Posterize - reduces color levels for poster-like effect.
data.effect_cartoon_desc: Cartoon - cell-shaded cartoon style with edge detection.
data.image_viewer_help: Click and drag to pan when zoomed. Use zoom slider or +/- buttons to adjust zoom level.
data.hsv_mover_desc: Adjust Hue, Saturation, and Value (Brightness) of your image. Convert shifts colors, Offset adds to existing colors.
data.hsv_convert_help: Convert adjusts HSV values directly. Use this for color shifting and toning.
data.hsv_offset_help: Offset adds to existing HSV values. Use this for fine-tuning after convert.
data.oilpaint_warning: ⚠️ Oil Paint effect is computationally expensive. Adjust parameters first, then click Apply to render. Real-time preview is disabled to prevent performance issues.
